text.S:
Performance Dashboard on AWS helps your team rapidly share performance data and stories with key stakeholders and the public. You can share digital metrics, such as cost per transaction, user satisfaction, digital uptake, and completion rate, or other operational metrics to track and improve your service delivery.

**What can I do with Performance Dashboard on AWS?** 

You can create and share data stories using a variety of content item types, including text, tables, charts, metrics, and images.

Content items can be added individually, duplicated, and rearranged to tell your story. You can also group content items into sections and display a table of contents to organize the display of your story.

**How can I use this example dashboard?**

This example dashboard is included to help you get started. You can read through this dashboard to see what's possible, edit this dashboard to explore how it was built, or duplicate this dashboard to customize its contents. 

Beneath each chart, you can also select "Actions" and then "Download" to download and modify the data set. This will help you structure your data for display.

You are currently reading a text content item, which supports [markdown syntax](https://gamma.badger.wwps.aws.dev/admin/markdown). Continue reading to see how to upload data and display data and other content item types.
